document.title: Adding New and Existing Items

xmlkeyword.term: EiffelEnvision, Adding New and Existing Items

document.paragraph:
Adding new project items to EiffelEnvision projects is based heavily on the context that are added in. Before reading the documentation linked to from this document, you should be aware of how projects are url*structured and the concepts and notations used in the url*Eiffel for .NET language.
in_this_section
2 In This Section
project_items.xml EiffelEnvision Project Item Templates
A breakdown of the new project item templates available to add to EiffelEnvision projects.
adding_item.xml Adding New Project Items
Explains how to add new project items, from the EiffelEnvision project templates, to the various parts of EiffelEnvision's project.
adding_folders.xml Adding New Folders
Explains how to add new folders to the various parts of EiffelEnvision's project hierarchy.
adding_existing_items.xml Adding Existing Items to Projects
Explains how to add existing items to EiffelEnvision projects.
adding_clusters.xml Adding Clusters to Projects
Explains how to Eiffel url*clusters to EiffelEnvision projects.
new_cluster_wizard.xml New Cluster Wizard
Help on using the New Cluster Wizard, used when adding a cluster to a project.
adding_cluster_guidelines.xml Adding Cluster Guidelines
Guidelines to be aware of when adding new url*clusters to EiffelEnvision projects.
